title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A girl who raised herself in the marshes becomes a murder suspect.

title: Normal People
author: Sally Rooney
description: Complex relationship between two Irish teenagers through school and university.

title: Little Fires Everywhere
author: Celeste Ng
description: Two families in 1990s Ohio clash over secrets and identity.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A Hollywood icon reveals secrets about her seven marriages.

title: The Song of Achilles
author: Madeline Miller
description: Achilles and Patroclus during the Trojan War.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A woman gets to explore alternate lives she could have lived.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Small changes that make a big difference in your life.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A woman raised in isolation by survivalist parents goes to college.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind from the Stone Age to the modern age.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.
